name: Marble Hell
description:
This is our submission to the Mix and Game Jam 2020 !

The theme of the jam was Mixing Genres, so we decided to mix marbles genre with bullet-hell genre.

The game was done by 4 people under 48 hours with the Godot game engine.

Everything was done during this period, except the textures and the blasting glass sound effects.

The textures were taken from freepbr.com and texturehave.com. The glass sound effects were taken from bigsoundbank.com.

Developpers:

- Théo Fafet - Programming, 3D art

- Brice Graulier, Anthony Choquard - Programming, Level design

- Barthélemy Passin-Cauneau - Music
